DbD is plagued with miscommunication from the devs to dev and from dev to the player. Its so visible its actually might make a good case to review for future game devs. 

Dev A: [i]"We do not want this to be a competitive game!"[/i]

Dev B: [b]"Here are competitive changes!! We are changing the meta constantly now!! And changed how rank works!!"[/b]

Its a clear sign that the devs are not on the same page, and the players are not on the same page with the devs. Because we don't know what they're trying to do now, nor their goals with DbD. 


Now I love DbD, I have been playing it for a couple years now. Its by no means a BAD game. Its just being poorly handled imo. 

The gameplay is solid, the gameplay loop is fun if you're just wanting to play this casually. 

Now where this all falls apart is when your Elo goes up even just a notch, you get matched with people who JUST WANNA WIN, and don't want a fun chase, they don't want a fun match. They will D/C and kill themselves on hook if they don't like the killer you're playing or going against. There isn't a slow climb to this elo, its legit after 3 good matches you get thrown into with people who have thousands and thousands of hours, and if they lose to you its the end of their life. 


Those are my gripes with the current state of the game, the game play is fine, the game isn't a buggy mess or unplayable. Its super fun!

Anyone that has played DBD for a extended amount of time knows its a love hate relationship. Before I continue, note that 90% of my playtime was done as Survivor. 

Let me start with the pros to this game. If you are looking for a game you can sink countless hours into to leveling up all your characters and collect all teachables, then there will always be something for you to do, cause even after 600 hours I don't have all my killers to level 40 yet. 

This game as survivor is easy to play, hard to master. The game for killer is hard to play, hard to master.
The game is constantly updated with new DLC and new cosmetics and also more recently with the Rift. New DLC is released every 3 months with one hotfix released about halfway between chapters. So the game doesn't stale very easily. There are so many perks that you can form into any build of your playstyle. The addition of crossplay has also been great.

Now I know that wasn't many pros. Now for the cons...

I don't even know where to start. The servers are very questionable. Killer hit detection has been a problem since the game has been out. The community is pretty toxic, every endgame chat is filled with it. Remember what I said about the game not getting stale? thats until you get your preferred roles characters perks all teachable, which at that point you should be red ranks. And at red ranks its just a sweat fest. It's hard to do any "fun" kind of build that doesn't include Meta Perks. The game is also pretty unreliable as a solo survivor. Once you get to that point of the game, there isn't much to do when a rift isn't around. The game experience also heavily relies on how the killer plays. Your match could be very unfun if the killer decides facecamp or tunnel the survivor off hook. That being said, it could also be very unfun for a killer to go against a 4 man SWF with one running Object of Obsession and the rest running DS Unbreakable and Dead Hard. Now recently the devs have announced changes to those very strong perks. So hopefully that makes things better.

Like I started with this review, this game is very much love hate. That being said I do recommend it.  The idea of the game is very cool with licensed characters such as Micheal Myers and Freddy Krueger. The game is very exciting but not so much scary as it becomes more of a competitive game than a horror game. Which isn't a bad thing. This game is much better played with friends. If you would rather torture yourself and stress yourself to the max as killer, go for it. If you become a great killer though, it is indeed something to brag about. Thank you for reading :)

So I really really loved playing Dead by Daylight with Friends.
Sometimes I also play alone but it's not even possible right now. Teammates are toxic and not even playing the game at all.
Matchmaking takes forever if not the hitboxes are broken and everyone takes advantage of it by playing killer.
Today I played about....30 Matches and I counted how many matches were toxic and how many were okay/friendly.
There were TWO matches who were good and friendly (winning not included)
In all the other games we had this one survivor who like 80% of the time kill themselfs instantly on hook if the killer catches them first or they farm you on hook in front of the killer for points and don't give a fuck about others or on how to play the game.

The MATCHMAKING IS A BIG JOKE
It normally takes FOREVER. The average time I waited the last weeks to get a match (during day, not nighttime) was around 10 to 15 MINUTES.
While waiting in queue you're able to cook a whole meal. Maybe showering,
baking a cake, making pizza! 

Another issue is the leveling.
I made two level ups but instead of leveling UP I lost TWO ranks.
How is a bug like this even possible?
Even though I won a lot of points to rank up there isn't anything happening making it even more frustrating to play.

Most of the other games where survivors weren't the problem the killer will flame us because buggy lags  or other bugs.
If you play this game in the state it is NOW. YOU SHOULD BE AWARE THAT YOU DONT HAVE ANY RIGHTS TO COMPLAIN ABOUT THIS BULLSHIT. Survivors aren't the cause of it. In the same game who he lagged ONCE we got hit through walls, paletts, WHOLE CARS and other stuff and won't even complain towards the killer because we don't even give him the fault. It's the developers. Toxic people everywhere. I mean they are in every game but fucking don't blame us for trying to enjoy this game even though there are MANY game breaking bugs.
Dead by daylight has bugs that are here with us since the RELEASE!!!!!!!! <- WHEN WILL THEY EVER FIX IT

But right now the game is in a position where I think I can't recommend the game for any players. You will get frustrated easily or randoms will flame you because they got out of bed with the wrong foot first.
Also you will get stuck in so many corners of the map. Or get hit over large distances /through walls/ cars because the hitboxes are broken. HOW CAN SUCH IMPORTANT FEATURES NOT GET HOTFIXED???
Leaving the game almost unable to enjoy for almost a week now? Instead they change animations or other stuff thats not as important as making the game playable.

The events are for the RICH BITCHES OUT THERE. Pay money for the good and pretty/cool stuff or earn like the most shittiest and ugliest item you can get. For a survivor you don't even play. Oh and some charms who aren't even worth playing for. DO THE DEVELOPERS EVEN CARE FOR THE GAME ANYMORE OR ARE THEY JUST LINGERING AROUND FOR GRABBING CASH OUT OF THIS GAME? 

 The developers don't even care about the complaints of the community EVER. The new HUD will be changed just because most of the people left bad reviews about the game. Most bugs won't get fixed for months or years even though the developers are most likely aware of them.

Every new patch destroys the game and makes it sometimes unplayable bringing back old bugs. It's like a reunion with your biggest nightmares.

总体来说还是推荐玩的。
玩久了你就会发现这根本就不是个恐怖游戏，和朋友一起排真的欢乐。但是国服外挂太多了，建议开加速器去外服。我排的红段里十局有六七局遇上挂。
由于我玩人类比较多所以主要说一说人类。
  -[b]如果你是个人类萌新[/b]：[u] 不要什么都不干就躲起来！！！ [/u]因为这样队友玩命修机抢下来的进度会被你躲没了，什么都不干就躲起来对逃出去一点儿帮助都没有，除非你专门来坑害队友的。我排到过好几个等队友都祭恶灵了之后就躲起来的家伙。那屠夫也楞，竟然找了十几分钟，后来屠夫拔了。
  -不要看见发电机就修，可以大体看一下发电机的位置然后分散着修。因为如果修到最后三连机的话对于局势非常不利，屠夫如果死守三连机跑出去的难度会非常大。【注：三连机指的是三台距离非常近的发电机】
  -对于遛屠夫这件事来说。多练习。在被追的时候多回头看一看，要有屠夫的视野，不然和屠夫二人转的时候容易被反绕套路。回头也有利于躲开兔子的斧子和枪手的矛弹这类远程攻击。
  -可以练一练贴模【注：贴模指的是人物紧贴着模型跑】这样能减少跑的路程，从而更快的逃跑/追击逃生者。
  -如果到了希望渺茫的时候可以试着和屠夫博弈，这也是杀机的一大乐趣。
  -不要在被屠夫追的时候看见板子就放板子！和屠夫绕一绕博弈几次再把板子放了转点。所谓“前人玩板，后人玩命”一张地图也就十几块板子，你队友怎么办。人类有的时候很讲究配合以及分工合作。该修机修机，该遛屠夫遛屠夫，别！逛！街！
  -杀机有很多有意思的技能搭配，可以仔细了解一下技能做一做技能搭配。
  -地图有箱子，别没事儿翻箱子玩。带有关于翻箱子的技能拿到了好的道具算是个增益。没有强盗直觉这个翻箱子技能基本就是谢特手。翻着高品质道具的机率微乎其微。
  -要多玩多练习才能成为人皇/屠皇啊   加油！！！

  对于制作组：
  -瘸子的锯子改的什么233。我个人认为还是以前的瘸子更有挑战性，玩法也多样。皮脸是DLC销量太少了吗，他电锯改了之后拿着满层锯子能绕着长模型跑两圈！有的时候拉锯还没有声音，我已经不知道被这个bug坑害几次了。这游戏还有一个乐趣就是找bug。多种Bug任君挑选。PRETTY GOOD JOB SO FAR。
